name: Rotom

ability.name: Power Tool
ability.effect: When you attach a tool to Rotom, you may search your discard for a Lightning Energy and attach it to Rotom. The tool cannot be discarded, and Rotom has 20 extra HP.

attacks.name: Incorporeal Movement
attacks.effect: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you find a Pokemon Tool. Attach it to Rotom, and shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Object Obliterate
attacks.effect: If Rotom has a Pokemon Tool attached to it, this attack deals 20 more damage.

flavor: These spirits love to possess objects, but many of them happen to be helpful. One Rotom built a house for its trainer and made national news.
